name: Piña Colada
description: Born in Puerto Rico in the mid-20th century, the Piña Colada is a tropical cocktail that's become synonymous with island relaxation. This creamy and sweet delight blends rum, coconut cream, and pineapple juice, creating a smooth, fruity fusion that transports your taste buds straight to the beach. Served often with a garnish of a pineapple wedge and maraschino cherry, the Piña Colada is the quintessential sip of Caribbean paradise.
instructions: Combine ingredients with some ice and shake well.
Garnish with pineapple slice and cherry.
